training.title: Training day
training.exerciseDescription: Complete exercises to improve your skills

victory.title: Congratulations!
victory.text: Keep practicing and improving your result.

about.title: Colors
about.descr: Benefit: Develops cognitive flexibility, ability to make quick decisions, suppress automatic reactions (Stroop effect).
about.rule1: 1. Look at the word ‚Äî it's written in different colors! Click on the card that matches the color of the text, not its value. üé®
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! üèÜ

about.title: Numbers
about.descr: Benefit: Improves visual perception, trains the ability to focus on the desired object among many distracting elements.
about.rule1: 1. Find and click on the card where the number matches the number shown below. üòä
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! üèÜ

about.title: Math Sprint
about.descr: Benefit: Develops speed of information processing, improves arithmetic skills, and helps train the brain for quick calculations.
about.rule1: 1. Solve the example and click on the card with the correct answer. üòä
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! üèÜ

about.title: Tongue Twisters
about.rule1: 1. You have 7 seconds to correctly pronounce the tongue twister. ‚è≥
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correctly pronounced tongue twister. Score resets on error! üèÜ

about.title: Sequence
about.descr: Benefit: Trains memory, attention and reaction speed.
about.rule1: 1. Look carefully at the cards for 5 seconds and memorize their sequence. üëÄ
about.rule2: 2. After the cards disappear, you have 5 seconds to click them in the same order. ‚è≥
about.rule3: 3. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! üèÜ

antistress.title: Anti-stress
antistress.description: Breathing to reduce stress and anxiety

box.title: Box Breathing
box.description: Breathing with equal intervals to calm the nervous system

about.title: Breath
about.descr: Benefit: Helps reduce stress and anxiety, improve concentration and sleep quality.
about.rule1: 1. Follow the instructions and perform the exercise.

about.title: Minesweeper
about.descr: Benefit: Develops logical thinking, improves decision-making skills and attention to detail.
about.rule1: 1. Click on cells to reveal what's hidden underneath. Avoid mines! üí£
about.rule2: 2. Numbers show how many mines are in adjacent cells. üî¢
about.rule3: 3. Switch to Flag mode to mark cells where you think mines are. üö©
about.rule4: 4. Clear all safe cells to win! Score resets on hitting a mine. üèÜ

spelling.title: Find the word with a spelling mistake

about.title: Spelling
about.descr: Benefit: Improves literacy, attention to detail, and develops visual memory for correct word spelling.
about.rule1: 1. Look at 4 words and find the one with a spelling mistake. üîç
about.rule2: 2. You have 10 seconds to find and click on the incorrect word. ‚è≥
about.rule3: 3. You get a point for each correct answer. Score resets on error! üèÜ

rules.title: Learn English Words
rules.description: Choose the correct English word that matches the Russian translation. You have 5 seconds for each word. Get 15 correct answers in a row to win!

about.title: Vocabulary
about.descr: Benefit: Expands English vocabulary, improves word recognition and translation speed.
about.rule1: 1. Look at the Russian word and find its correct English translation among the cards. üìö
about.rule2: 2. You have 5 seconds to choose the correct translation. ‚è≥
about.rule3: 3. Get 15 correct answers in a row to win! Score resets on error. üèÜ

about.title: Grid Sequence
about.descr: Benefit: Develops multitasking skills, visual scanning, and sequential processing abilities.
about.rule1: 1. Click on the numbers in ascending order (from smallest to largest) as quickly as possible. üî¢
about.rule2: 2. The grid size increases as you progress through levels. üìà
about.rule3: 3. Make a mistake or run out of time, and you'll have to start over! ‚è≥

about.title: Math Blocks
about.descr: Benefit: Develops multitasking abilities, quick mathematical thinking, and decision-making under time pressure.
about.rule1: 1. Math blocks with equations will fall from the top. Click on blocks with correct answers! üßÆ
about.rule2: 2. Watch out for incorrect equations - clicking them or letting correct ones reach the bottom will reset your score! ‚ö†Ô∏è
about.rule3: 3. Get 20 correct answers in a row to win! üèÜ

about.title: Durak
about.descr: Benefit: Develops strategic thinking, decision-making skills, and memory.
about.rule1: 1. Each player gets 6 cards. The last card determines the trump suit. üÉè
about.rule2: 2. Player with the lowest trump card starts. Beat cards with higher cards of the same suit or trumps. üéØ
about.rule3: 3. Win by getting rid of all your cards first! The last player with cards is the Durak (Fool). üèÜ

eyeTracker.title: Eye Tracker
eyeTracker.description: Improves focus and eye movement control

plans.title: Choose your plan
plans.subtitle: Unlock all exercises and get more features

step1.title: Welcome to Health App
step1.text: Develop your attention, memory, and thinking with engaging exercises. Our trainings will help you become faster, more attentive, and more effective in everyday tasks.

step2.title: Why is it important?
step2.text: Cognitive abilities are the foundation of successful thinking. Regular training improves concentration, learning ability, and decision-making. And it's just fun!

step3.title: Start now!
step3.text: Pass the first training and evaluate your level. Only 5 minutes a day ‚Äî and your brain will become sharper than ever!
